title: Graduate student: Master's in Computer Information Systems
bio: Cybersecurity enthusiast and back-end developer with a strong interest in Go, databases, and secure systems. Experienced in building web applications, working with SQL, and applying risk management frameworks. Passionate about open source projects, continuous learning, and bridging the gap between software engineering and information security.
skills: Cybersecurity (NIST Frameworks, Risk Assessment, Incident Response)
Penetration Testing Tools (Wireshark, Hydra, OpenVAS, Nessus, Splunk)
